title: Mechanic (Breeding #2)
description: Storyline: Everything was fine until that innocent little rich girl walked into my garage. Since the second I laid my eyes on her, all I've wanted to do is get my dirty hands on her pure body. There's one minor obstacle standing in my way, but I've got a plan. All I've got to do is claim her, and sheâ€™ll be mine forever. Warning: This book is over-the-top, insta-love. If you want it hot and dirty, this is it! *whispers* There's a sweet smutty surprise at the end!
